resources.string:
Before using this application, you have to grant permission with adb tools, copy the command below and execute it on PC:

%1$s

Alternatively you can use root to grant permission.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Normal display mode\nUse quick toggle to temporarily enable grayscale mode
Grayscale display mode\nUse quick toggle to temporarily enable normal mode
By pressing the toggle in your notification panel, you\'ll enable/disable the grayscale mode by the selected amount of time

Application made by Fabio Rosada, artwork by Natalia Petliak.

You can find the source code on GitHub https://github.com/BerenLuth/Greyscale

This app is a fork of Greyscale app made by Fei-ke, you can find the code here https://github.com/fei-ke/Greyscale
Quick toggle switches are placed at the top of the notification panel. Usually there\'s a button to edit them, you can use it to add and find the grayscale toggle
You can select a time window to turn grayscale on automatically.
This function will not work until you grant the permission to activate grayscale.
Grayscale+ allows you to put a gray-scale filter on your phone, download it from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.berenluth.grayscale
